title: # 420 - Jack Maxwell & ME
description:
Today I chat remotely with TV host Jack Maxwell. We talk about being on Travel Channel, getting cancer, his dads drug addiction, how his Mother got out of the projects, favorite drinking moments, and much more! 

Check out “The High Road with Jack Maxwell” on YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-nvMhMcHEHG_o6UTReOJ7Q 

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free at http://www.GetQuip.com/Bertcast 

This episode is brought to you by Policy Genius. In just a few minutes you can find your best price and apply at http://www.Policygenius.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
